alert.note: Alert for Boone; Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern Randolph, Nicholas, southeastern Kanawha, southeastern Lewis, Braxton, southern Upshur, northwestern Raleigh, Webster, Clay, Fayette and southeastern Boone Counties through 1145 AM EST... At 1045 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Gassaway to near Wharton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkins, Summersville, Fayetteville, Richwood, Rainelle, Sutton, Clay, Webster Springs, Babcock State Park, Oak Hill, Montgomery, Mount Hope, Ansted, Gassaway, Smithers, Addison (Webster Springs), Gauley Bridge, Pratt, Camden-On-gauley and Birch River. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 43 and 76. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 52 and 79. Route 19 between mile markers 4 and 68. Route 33 between mile markers 31 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh
